notes_translated.fr: Agence du revenu du Canada (ARC): Dans l'édition de 2017, les Statistiques finales présentent les données établies en fonction des déclarations de revenus de 2015 produites et traitées jusqu'au 30 juin 2017. La cotisation la plus récente est utilisée pour compiler les statistiques. Toutes statistiques dans cette publication peuvent faire l'objet d'une révision.
notes_translated.en: Canada Revenue Agency's (CRA): The 2019 edition of Final Statistics presents data based on 2017 tax year returns filed and processed up to June 30, 2019. The most recent assessment is used to compile the statistics. As a result, for returns that have been reassessed, the most current reassessed values are used to prepare the tables. All of the statistics in this publication are subject to revision.

fr: impôt provincial ou territorial à payer
impôt sur le revenu des particuliers

name: bffa692e-6a52-4d35-85b8-c3534d4f8f9e
notes: Canada Revenue Agency's (CRA): The 2019 edition of Final Statistics presents data based on 2017 tax year returns filed and processed up to June 30, 2019. The most recent assessment is used to compile the statistics. As a result, for returns that have been reassessed, the most current reassessed values are used to prepare the tables. All of the statistics in this publication are subject to revision.
title: T1 Final Statistics 2019 edition (for the 2017 tax year)
